forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High near 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low near 40F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 53F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 39F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 50F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 41F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
